ygData.subject: RE: Today's patch
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry - I guess I should have been more clear.  It appears to only affect casters who were using this method to rapidly come back and fight some more -
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:57 PM 2/23/00 -0800, you wrote:
>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> >This sucks. If you want to do a few duels with friends, it means you'll
> >only be able to use Denon's Desperate Dirge for the first one.
> >Oh well, only one duel a night I guess.
>
> >Elwyn
>
>Um. When bards die, they don't come back with any mana to begin with.
>Is this different in duels?


Sorry - I guess I should have been more clear. It appears to only affect
casters who were using this method to rapidly come back and fight some more
- allowing them to take down big things that they normally wouldn't have
been able to.

Talies the bored
